summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of South Gazelle Street from approximately 500 feet west of 51st Ave. South to 51st Ave. South; by asphaltic paving; all in accordance with Resolution No. 23143 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
